onboarding: Let's get started! Learn more about the app and enjoy its features!

home.premiumInfoDesc: This feature requires a premium subscription. Please subscribe.
home.paySuccess: Congratulations, your payment has been successfully completed!
home.payDesc: You can now add your close ones and enjoy the app.
home.payNote: Please keep this. It will be required for restoring your account.

modal.locationAddDesc: You can add a location by entering the code.
modal.locationAddError: Code is incorrect or already in use.
modal.locationShareDesc: You can share your location by passing the code.
modal.zoneDelete: To delete the zone, hold it.
modal.zoneModalDesc: Fill in the form to add a new zone.

details.matchRemoveDesc: Are you sure you want to stop following this user?
details.matchRemoveAgainDesc: You cannot undo this action. Are you sure you want to proceed?

settings.title: Settings
settings.restoreDesc: Enter the code received after payment.

payment.contetentDesc1: Users can share their location online using unique codes. The tracked user can activate the invisibility mode to turn off tracking.
payment.contetentDesc2: Notifications are sent when entering or exiting certain zones. You can view movements for the last seven days.

permissions.notificationPermissionDenied: Notification permission not granted. We cannot send you notifications.
permissions.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission not granted. We cannot show you location information.
permissions.backgroundLocationPermissionDenied: Background permission not granted. Your close ones cannot see you.

locationPermission.title: Your location could not be found
locationPermission.message: To see your location, you need to grant location permission. Please check your permission settings.

slides.slide1desc: Please allow notifications so we can send you notifications.
slides.slide2desc: Allow location access so we can find people near you and connect you with your close ones.
slides.slide3desc: This app wants to track your activity in other apps and websites to provide you with a better experience.
slides.slide4desc: We need to run in the background to keep connected with your close ones. Please choose 'ALLOW ALL TIME'.
